summary: Provides interactive command‑line utilities to collect and validate SageMaker deployment settings, construct a SageMaker configuration object, and manage required AWS resources such as IAM roles for the Accelerate library.
business_intent: Simplify the setup of SageMaker training jobs for users of the Accelerate framework by automating configuration prompts, resource creation, and conversion of user choices into a ready‑to‑use SageMakerConfig.
